content: SXS_2025_08_11 Release Notes Release Date: 2025_08_11 Release Scope: Features developed as part of the CAE Crew Info Models Integration: Event Handling & Flow Fixes: Resolved issues in CAE StaticDataChanged event consumer tracking and migration flow. Dashboard Fixes: Fixed query logic in the Flight Crew Data Audit Dashboard. GraphQL Integration Improvements: Crew Info Data Model: Fixed the leaveDate query parameter. Crew Communication Data Model: Corrected case sensitivity in the value attribute filter. Model Enhancements: Electronic Flight Bag Plan Info Data Model introduced. Added relevant fields to existing models: OFP Fuel: onBoardFuel, onBoardFuelTimeEquivalence.
